## Description
Made of textured vegetable protein (like soy), legumes (beans), tofu, nuts, mushrooms, or grains or seeds, like wheat and flax. 

## Characteristics

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Edible:|true|
|Type:|Derived|
|Form:|Solid|
